mapper.select:
SELECT /* PosSalesSaleSaveCardMapper.selectDefault : POS.S_SALE_SAVE, 2016-07-11, green */ 0 AS seq /* 일련번호 */ , 0 AS cdVan /* VAN사코드 */ , 0 AS ynInternet /* 인터넷승인유무 */ , 0 AS ynApproval /* 승인유무 */ , '' AS terminalId /* 단말기번호 */ , '' AS dsInput /* PosEntryCode */ , '' AS noCard /* 카드번호 */ , 0 AS installment /* 할부개월 */ , 0 AS amtApproval /* 거래금액 */ , 0 AS amtTip /* 봉사료 */ , 0 AS amtTax /* 부가세액 */ , 0 AS amtDc /* 할인금액 */ , '' AS ymdApprovalOrg /* 원거래일자 */ , '' AS noApprovalOrg /* 원승인번호 */ , '' AS cdAnswer /* 응답코드 */ , '' AS noTrade /* 거래고유번호 */ , '' AS dtTrade /* 거래일시 */ , '' AS noApproval /* 승인번호 */ , '' AS cdCardIssue /* 발급사코드 */ , '' AS nmCardIssue /* 발급사명 */ , '' AS dsBuy /* 매입구분 */ , '' AS cdCardBuy /* 매입사코드 */ , '' AS nmCardBuy /* 매입사명 */ , '' AS noAffiliate /* 가맹점사업자번호 */ , '' AS ymdApproval /* VAN승인일자 */ , '' AS cdOutputControl /* 출력제어코드 */ , '' AS outputMsg1 /* 출력메시지1 */ , '' AS outputMsg2 /* 출력메시지2 */ , '' AS outputMsg3 /* 출력메시지3 */ , '' AS outputMsg4 /* 출력메시지4 */ , 0 AS ynTest /* 테스트 승인 여부 */ FROM DUAL
/* AND SS.ID = #{storeId} */
